name: 英語口語溝通技巧
restrict: ◎限外系修習    ◎第一階段限 榮譽英語學程◎限榮譽英語學程選修◎必須先修過【00UB8A1  英文（二）】
description: The course aims to enhance non-English majors' oral English communication skills. It consists of three parts. The first part targets at elevating students' competence in conducting and managing social conversation in English. The second part focuses on cultivating students' ability to give a speech or an oral presentation. The last part of the course aims to develop students' ability to participate in oral argumentation by acquiring the knowledge of the argumentation process, critical thinking skills, and argumentative discourse.
goals: 強化學生英語文閱讀、聆聽的策略與能力，協助獲取專業領域新知
提昇英語文口語、寫作的表達能力，期盼學生能於工作職場及學術研究領域展現英語專業涵養。
協助學生深入瞭解國際社會的多元文化，培養國際觀，對特定文化現象進行分析、比較，激發學生之批判性思考能力。

Grading Policy:

Discussing leading: 30%

Participating in dicussion: 40%

Assignments: 20%

methodologies.note: Students will learn to offer their insight into various issues in English
Students will work in groups in leading an effective discussion.

grading.note: Students will receive various assignments in helping them organize their discussion.
Students will be responsible for leading a discussion online on an issue of their interest.
Students will present orally their final reflection about leading an English discussion.
Students will actively participate in class discussion and group discussion with Japanese college students.
